intro: Cryptantha setosissima, commonly known as the prickly cryptantha, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the Brassicaceae family, which includes mustard and cabbage plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pale purple. Its leaves are narrow and covered in fine hairs, giving it a distinctive appearance. Cryptantha setosissima typically grows in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to arid environments.
